name: Pornhub Video Downloader
tagline: Save Pornhub videos instantly for offline viewing.
description:
Pornhub Video Downloader saves scenes from Pornhub, Pornhub Premium, and Thumbzilla as clean MP4 files. It detects free and subscriber-only players, lists every available resolution, and converts adaptive streams in the background so you can watch offline without buffering or ads.

Stay logged in, pick your quality, and the extension handles headers, chunk downloads, and merging automatically. Progress stays visible even if you reload the page, and your downloads finish quietly in Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, or Opera.

faqs.question: How do I download a Pornhub video with this extension?
faqs.answer: Open the video, click the downloader icon, choose your preferred resolution, and let the progress bar finish. The MP4 will save using the original title in your downloads folder.

faqs.question: Does it work with Pornhub Premium?
faqs.answer: Yes. Stay logged into your Premium account and the extension will access subscriber-exclusive streams using your active session—no extra setup required.

faqs.question: Can I download from Thumbzilla too?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Thumbzilla uses similar players, and the extension detects and downloads those streams using the same workflow.

faqs.question: Will it capture captions or interactive overlays?
faqs.answer: The downloader focuses on video and audio. Captions, overlays, or interactive elements aren’t included in the MP4 file.

faqs.question: Which browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Builds are available for Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on Windows, macOS, and Linux desktops. Safari is not supported.

faqs.question: Does the tab need to stay open during the download?
faqs.answer: Yes. Keeping the original tab open ensures Premium sessions stay active and progress tracking continues uninterrupted.

faqs.question: Is my activity private?
faqs.answer: All conversion happens locally and no analytics are collected. Only the final MP4 touches your filesystem so your viewing remains private.
